title: Dieters chicken stir fry delight
ingredients: ['drizzle extra virgin olive oil', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 yellow pepper, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 pack (540g) chicken breasts, diced', '1 bag or tin beansprouts', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '300g wok noodles', '3 tablespoons light soy sauce']
